牙龜老喇

Russell Westbrook is one of my favorite NBA players. Michael Jordan is the greatest basketball player of all time. I used to enjoy watching Vince Carter play who was a very exciting slam dunker. In fact, he is considered to be the greatest slam dunker of his time.🏀🏀 My friend, Susannah is on her period so she cannot have cold drinks, coffee, ice cream and tomatoes right now. Her aunt flow is visiting. She's having stomach cramps right now so she has taken a day of menstrual leave. Her sister feels bloated as well which means her period is gonna come soon. She's been having bad cramps recently too but her period is late this month; it's a week late. She's being so emotional today as it's that time of the month again. Her cousin, Margaret missed her period so she may be pregnant. Her cousin's husband did his back workout this afternoon during which he overtrained his lats, middle back and lower back so he's had cramps in his back. Susannah's brother will be attending a party next weekend but I won't be going with him so as not to cramp his style. I don't wanna put any pressure on him that would cramp his style. I don't want him to be under pressure which would cramp his style.
